Articles.Content: I develop a vaccine. My cure!

![ANGRY_TITAN.jpg](http://1d4chan.org/images/b/b2/ANGRY_TITAN.jpg)

no further explanation needed. my titan and also hill/computer.
I make a spike on dres my hill.

Using the isotunneling concept developed by Kerbals, we will be able to go anywhere in the entire universe within minutes. It also acts as a defense, so retaliation is not advisable. Just let it happen... It'll be quick.
i have hyper edit so i destroy your isotunnler and hyper edit every thing in the universe inside the universe biggest sun my universe clump

I use my modpowers to lock the thread, thus retaining my rightful place as king of the hill.

/thread

I merely edit everything back into the quicksave folder and reload. It's quite apparent that retaliation is needed, so I edit myself some weaponry in as well, move the files to a drive unit, and give that drive write protection.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T01:54:45Z" title="05/11/2015 01:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

I find your real world address and set off a nuclear blast, destroying the drive containing the universe.

My radioactive hill.
Yes but destroying the drive destroyed you but since I exist outside this universe I'm fine so my destroyed universe

As part of a group of problem solvers, we have prepared for this chain of events. While the drive of the universe may have been destroyed, we had to exist outside of it in order to interface with it's parameters. We simply coaxilated our spacial coordinates to exist outside of the realm of reality. 

You can keep your destroyed universe.

"Nothing unreal exists," Kiri-kin-Tha's First Law of Metaphysics.

My universe, recreated.
That law was created because of primitive thinking. I can easily take back this universe if I so wish. I can exit coaxial space right now if I so wished.

You exit coaxial space, only to find me.

I then force you to give me the universe by using cute sad kerbal smileys.

My universe.

<usb key=""></usb>

ctrl+x

ctrl+v

my universe.

/pickpocket

USB DRIVE FOUND!

PICK-POCKETING SKILLS INCREASED!

My USB Drive with Universe in it.

"I reject your reality, and subsitute my own!"

my reality.

The concept of reality is only a filtered perspective. You exist in your own universe, not mine.

I'm pretty sure you know what that means...

THe multiverse collapses, merging all universes into one.

I shove you off what is now my hill.

I "borrow" a time machine, and undo all the cataclysms that have occurred since I lost my rightful hill.

My TARDIS

Your TARDIS leaves you behind on a strange hill. I come and throw you off.

My hill.

A paradox has occurred here. Changing any cataclysmic events means that you wont go back in time to change them, therefore they happen, therefore you do go back, effectively meaning you wont go back to change them.

This is my paradox now.

I invent a new universe and make an apple pie. 

My apple pie.
I eat the pie. my nutrients.

I compress you to pill form to gain the nutrients back.

My vitamin pill.

I add an "O" and a "W."

My vitamin pillow.
